name: BetterWinDocs
author: mojo
description: Binary Ninja sidebar that shows Microsoft Learn Win32 API docs when you click imported WinAPI functions.
longdescription:
## Description

This plugin adds a `Docs` sidebar widget to Binary Ninja.

When you click a token that resolves to an imported WinAPI function, the sidebar fetches the corresponding Microsoft Learn Win32 API page and displays the function's Syntax, Description, and Return value.

Clicks that do not resolve to a WinAPI function do not update the sidebar.

Results are cached in `cache.json` in the plugin directory to reduce repeated network requests.
